channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Une Polar Pacer Pro et une ceinture cardio dans un pack à moins de 250 € : voici le meilleur combo pour les coureurs
item.description: Avec ses données sportives très détaillées, la montre connectée Polar Pacer Pro est un compagnon idéal pour vos entraînements. Actuellement, elle se trouve justement, aux côtés d'une ceinture cardio Polar H10, dans un pack à 249 euros au lieu de 448,90 euros chez Alltricks.

item.title: Leica’s Leitzphone by Xiaomi has a huge 1-inch camera sensor and a stylish new design
item.description: Alongside a global launch for Xiaomi's 17 Ultra (read about that right here), the company announced a further deepening of its relationship with Leica. The CEO of Leica, Mattias Harsch, took to the stage to announce a new Leitzphone, which appears to be an even deeper collaboration than 17 Ultra by Leica, which is a different phone. Confused? That's fair. Design-wise, Leica has shifted back to a single tone body color, which looks more "Leica" to this camera dilettante's eyes. And if you’re thinking you’ve heard of the Leitzphone before, you probably have: it was a series of phones made by Sh...

item.title: The Witcher is a perfect fit for Reigns’ Tinder-like roleplaying
item.description: I never knew how easy it was to die in an orgy. But that's just one of the many threats facing Geralt of Rivia in his latest adventure. The studio behind the Reigns series of Tinder-like choose-your-own-adventure games has now adapted The Witcher, following a handful of original titles and a take on Game of […]

item.title: 20 years ago, Apple launched a Mac that changed mini-PCs forever – and offered quadruple the performance of its predecessor
item.description: The first Intel Mac mini launched 20 years ago today, marking a clear break with the PowerPC past.

item.title: A new Stuff Your Kindle Day is live for 1 day only — score dark romance books for free
item.description: The latest Stuff Your Kindle Day is live on Feb. 28. Indulge in the Darkness is offering free dark romance books for one day only.

item.title: Shokz OpenFit Pro Review: Open Earbuds With the One Thing You’ve Always Wanted
item.description: Shokz OpenFit Pro envision a world where open-style earbuds have their own version of noise cancellation—and it actually feels possible.

item.title: Bosgame M4 Mini PC features an AMD Ryzen 7 8745HS processor, 32GB of DDR5 RAM, and a 1TB SSD — and it’s currently on sale

item.title: On a testé le casque vélo Shimano Nova Kineticore : bien éclairé ou bien ventilé, il faudra choisir
item.description: Compatible speedbike et avec une surcouche protectrice, le casque vélo Shimano Nova Kineticore excelle en ventilation même en configuration avec éclairage, garantit un bon confort, mais manque peut-être d’arguments vu son tarif élevé. Voici notre test complet.

item.title: Boulanger brade à -30 % ce laptop Acer sous Snapdragon X à l’autonomie généreuse
